Here are some of the best ideas across the energy transition, digital and analytics, workforce development, and more.</div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div data-component="mdc-c-module-wrapper" data-module-theme="light" data-module-background="white" data-module-category="StandalonePromo" data-module-gradient-position="top-right" class="mck-c-full-text-c  mck-c-module-wrapper"><div class="mck-o-container"><div class="UpModule_mck-c-up__irSw8"><div data-component="mdc-c-content-block" class="mdc-c-content-block___7p6Lu_990311c mck-c-full-text-c__content-block FullTextC_mck-c-full-text-c__content-block--module-center-aligned__qo8OU mdc-u-grid mdc-u-grid-gutter-xxl mdc-u-grid-col-sm-1 mdc-u-grid-col-md-4"><div class="mck-c-full-text-c__column mdc-u-grid-col-md-span-4"><div class="FullTextC_mck-c-full-text-c__text-content__3NKIh mck-u-links-inline mdc-o-content-body"><p><strong>The pathway to sustainable infrastructure</strong> is neither straight nor short. But its successful navigation to reach net-zero emissions is the unrivaled business challenge of a generation of leaders.</p>

<p>Since 2012, the Global Infrastructure Initiative Summit has convened many of the world’s most senior leaders to connect and collaborate in pursuit of smart, resilient, and future-ready infrastructure. The eighth GII Summit took place in Tokyo, October 19–21, 2022, and focused on creating the pathway to sustainable infrastructure.</p>

<p>And indeed, the top of the CEO agenda is now unavoidably—and rightfully—dominated by sustainability. Meaningful strides in decarbonization, the energy transition, social equity, resilience, digital transformation, and talent acquisition will require bold commitments, matched by action and collaboration across the value chain.</p></div></div></div></div></div></div><div data-component="mdc-c-module-wrapper" data-module-theme="light" data-module-background="white" data-module-category="" data-module-gradient-position="top-right" class="mck-c-module-wrapper"><div class="mck-o-container"><div class="UpModule_mck-c-up__irSw8"><div data-component="mdc-c-module-wrapper" data-module-theme="default" data-module-background="transparent" data-module-category="" class=""><div id="" data-layer-region="ceros-body"><div class="Ceros_mck-c-ceros-section__l2zpJ mck-u-screen-only"><style>.ceros-experience-holder-experience-6385254a43bc5 {

class="mdc-c-heading___0fM1W_990311c mdc-u-ts-2"><div>Decarbonization and the energy transition</div></h3><div data-component="mdc-c-description" class="mdc-c-description___SrnQP_990311c mdc-u-ts-7"><div class="mck-u-links-inline mck-c-generic-item__description"><ul>
    <li>Drive energy outcomes at an ecosystem level: combine carrots (incentives), sticks (regulation, taxes, carbon pricing) and tambourines (praising and supporting successes) to move the needle</li>
    <li>Break ground now—the next 5–10 years are crucial, and going from brown to green is just as important as developing green infrastructure</li>
    <li>Embed carbon and resilience into the time, quality, and cost equation</li>
    <li>Establish a capital stack across the public and private sector, trading reduced risk for the private sector up front for outsized government returns later in the life cycle</li>
</ul></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div data-component="mdc-c-module-wrapper" data-module-theme="light" data-module-background="white" data-module-category="" data-module-gradient-position="top-right" class="mdc-u-grid mck-c-two-up-medium TwoUpMedium_mck-c-two-up-medium--reverse-order__wrFnB mck-o-edge-to-edge mck-c-module-wrapper mck-c-module-wrapper--collapse-top-spacing" data-module-type="StandalonePromo" data-module-name="two-up-medium"><div class="TwoUpMedium_mck-c-two-up-medium__column-container__wpLlL mdc-u-grid mdc-u-grid-col-md-2 mdc-u-grid-col-sm-1 mdc-u-grid-gutter-xxs"><div data-component="mdc-c-module-wrapper" data-module-theme="light" data-module-background="lightest-grey" data-module-category="" class="mck-o-container--mobile-spacing TwoUpMedium_mck-c-two-up-medium__column__69jG3 TwoUpMedium_mck-c-two-up-medium__column--top__FUUx1 TwoUpMedium_mck-c-two-up-medium__column--left__rgxUN"><div class="TwoUpMedium_mck-c-two-up-medium__item-container__xg9_U"><div class="mdc-u-grid mdc-u-grid-gutter-lg mdc-u-grid-col-sm-1 mdc-u-grid--align-start GenericItem_mck-c-generic-item__sGwKL"><div data-component="mdc-c-content-block" class="mdc-c-content-block___7p6Lu_990311c mdc-u-grid-gutter-xs GenericItem_mck-c-generic-item__content__gq1m0"><div data-component="mdc-c-content-block" class="mdc-c-content-block___7p6Lu_990311c"><h3 data-component="mdc-c-heading" class="mdc-c-heading___0fM1W_990311c mdc-u-ts-2"><div>Digital and analytics transformation</div></h3><div data-component="mdc-c-description" class="mdc-c-description___SrnQP_990311c mdc-u-ts-7"><div class="mck-u-links-inline mck-c-generic-item__description"><ul>
    <li>Radically reduce waste, then digitize processes via people-first design</li>
    <li>Understand cybersecurity as a cost of doing business</li>
    <li>Establish collaboration incentives—adopt common data standards, foster transparency, co-invest in tech</li>
    <li>Protect the digital economy (and its expected growth) through physical asset investment—bring together tech, power generation, and fiber to drive upgrades and expansion</li>
</ul></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div data-component="mdc-c-module-wrapper" data-module-theme="light" data-module-background="lightest-grey" data-module-category="" class="mck-u-links-inline mck-c-generic-item__description"><ul>
    <li>Reimagine the value proposition for the industry—promoting purpose, addressing hybrid vs onsite challenges head-on, and strengthening the role of apprenticeship</li>
    <li>Access a more diverse talent base through nontraditional talent, sharing a version of the future earlier, and ensuring underrepresented populations can see themselves in leadership</li>
    <li>Radically transform how work is done to increase quality and productivity—doing more, in different ways, with different capabilities</li>
</ul></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div data-component="mdc-c-module-wrapper" data-module-theme="light" data-module-background="white" data-module-category="" data-module-gradient-position="top-right" class="mdc-u-grid mck-c-two-up-medium TwoUpMedium_mck-c-two-up-medium--reverse-order__wrFnB mck-o-edge-to-edge mck-c-module-wrapper mck-c-module-wrapper--collapse-top-spacing" data-module-type="StandalonePromo" data-module-name="two-up-medium"><div class="TwoUpMedium_mck-c-two-up-medium__column-container__wpLlL mdc-u-grid mdc-u-grid-col-md-2 mdc-u-grid-col-sm-1 mdc-u-grid-gutter-xxs"><div data-component="mdc-c-module-wrapper" data-module-theme="light" data-module-background="lightest-grey" data-module-category="" class="mck-o-container--mobile-spacing TwoUpMedium_mck-c-two-up-medium__column__69jG3 TwoUpMedium_mck-c-two-up-medium__column--top__FUUx1 TwoUpMedium_mck-c-two-up-medium__column--left__rgxUN"><div class="TwoUpMedium_mck-c-two-up-medium__item-container__xg9_U"><div class="mdc-u-grid mdc-u-grid-gutter-lg mdc-u-grid-col-sm-1 mdc-u-grid--align-start GenericItem_mck-c-generic-item__sGwKL"><div data-component="mdc-c-content-block" class="mdc-c-content-block___7p6Lu_990311c mdc-u-grid-gutter-xs GenericItem_mck-c-generic-item__content__gq1m0"><div data-component="mdc-c-content-block" class="mdc-c-content-block___7p6Lu_990311c"><h3 data-component="mdc-c-heading" class="mdc-c-heading___0fM1W_990311c mdc-u-ts-2"><div>Project development and delivery</div></h3><div data-component="mdc-c-description" class="mdc-c-description___SrnQP_990311c mdc-u-ts-7"><div class="mck-u-links-inline mck-c-generic-item__description"><ul>
    <li>Put the team first: Collaboration, not contracts, delivers successful projects</li>
    <li>Get serious on moving capital project delivery methodologies into the manufacturing age</li>
    <li>Standardize the standardization process—international standards and shared operational best practices</li>
    <li>Create responsibilities for project outcomes, not individual slices of the value chain</li>
    <li>Courage: state and live by the ambition to deliver every project at technical limit cost and speed</li>
</ul></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div data-component="mdc-c-module-wrapper" data-module-theme="light" data-module-background="lightest-grey" data-module-category=""
